thread.title: Inside the 'pure hell' of violence against women in Honduras PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Inside the 'pure hell' of violence against women in Honduras | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Inside the 'pure hell' of violence against women in Honduras PBS NewsHour
text: In Honduras, poverty, gang violence and corruption are fueling a domestic-violence epidemic in the Central American country where on average, a woman is murdered every 13 hours. As a result, many Honduran women flee the country and become part of a wave of undocumented immigrants to the United States. Special Correspondent John Carlos Frey reports.
